24 #include <assert.h>
25 #include <pthread.h>
26 #include <stdlib.h>

36 #define BUFFER_LEN 1024
37 
38 struct struct_bgpstream_reader_t {
39  struct struct_bgpstream_reader_t *next;
40  char dump_name[BGPSTREAM_DUMP_MAX_LEN]; // name of bgp dump
41  char dump_project[BGPSTREAM_PAR_MAX_LEN]; // name of bgp project
42  char dump_collector[BGPSTREAM_PAR_MAX_LEN]; // name of bgp collector
43  char dump_type[BGPSTREAM_PAR_MAX_LEN]; // type of bgp dump (rib or update)
44  long dump_time; // timestamp associated with the time the bgp data was aggregated
45  long record_time; // timestamp associated with the current bd_entry
46  BGPDUMP_ENTRY *bd_entry;
47  int successful_read; // n. successful reads, i.e. entry != NULL
48  int valid_read; // n. reads successful and compatible with filters
49  bgpstream_reader_status_t status;
50 
51  BGPDUMP *bd_mgr;
53  pthread_t producer;
54  /* has the thread opened the dump? */
55  int dump_ready;
56  pthread_cond_t dump_ready_cond;
57  pthread_mutex_t mutex;
58  /* have we already checked that the dump is ready? */
59  int skip_dump_check;
60 };
61 
62 static void *thread_producer(void *user)
63 {
64  bgpstream_reader_t *bsr = (bgpstream_reader_t *)user;
65 
66  /* all we do is open the dump */
67  if((bsr->bd_mgr = bgpdump_open_dump(bsr->dump_name)) == NULL) {
68  bsr->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_CANT_OPEN_DUMP;
69  }
70 
71  pthread_mutex_lock(&bsr->mutex);
72  bsr->dump_ready = 1;
73  pthread_cond_signal(&bsr->dump_ready_cond);
74  pthread_mutex_unlock(&bsr->mutex);
75 
76  return NULL;
77 }
78 
79 static BGPDUMP_ENTRY *get_next_entry(bgpstream_reader_t *bsr)
80 {
81  if(bsr->skip_dump_check == 0) {
82  pthread_mutex_lock(&bsr->mutex);
83  while (bsr->dump_ready == 0) {
84  pthread_cond_wait(&bsr->dump_ready_cond, &bsr->mutex);
85  }
86  pthread_mutex_unlock(&bsr->mutex);
87 
88  bsr->skip_dump_check = 1;
89  }
90 
91  /* now, grab an entry from bgpdump */
92  return bgpdump_read_next(bsr->bd_mgr);
93 }
94 
95 /* -------------- Reader functions -------------- */
96 
97 static bool bgpstream_reader_filter_bd_entry(const BGPDUMP_ENTRY * const bd_entry,
98  const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t * const filter_mgr) {
99  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: filter entry: start");
100  bgpstream_interval_filter_t * tif;
101  if(bd_entry != NULL && filter_mgr != NULL) {
102  if(filter_mgr->time_intervals == NULL ) {
103  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: filter entry: end");
104  return true; // no time filtering,
105  }
106  int current_entry_time = bd_entry->time;
107  tif = filter_mgr->time_intervals;
108  while(tif != NULL) {
109  if(current_entry_time >= tif->begin_time &&
110  current_entry_time <= tif->end_time) {
111  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: filter entry: OK");
112  return true;
113  }
114  tif = tif->next;
115  }
116  }
117  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: filter entry: DISCARDED");
118  return false;
119 }
120 
121 
122 static void bgpstream_reader_read_new_data(bgpstream_reader_t * const bs_reader,
123  const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t * const filter_mgr) {
124  bool significant_entry = false;
125  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: read new data: start");
126  if(bs_reader == NULL) {
127  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: read new data: invalid reader provided");
128  return;
129  }
130  if(bs_reader->status != BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_VALID_ENTRY) {
131  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: read new data: reader cannot read new data (previous read was not successful)");
132  return;
133  }
134  // if a valid record was read before (or it is the first time we read something)
135  // assert(bs_reader->status == BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_VALID_ENTRY)
136  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: read new data: bd_entry has to be set to NULL");
137  // entry should not be destroyed, otherwise we could destroy
138  // what is in the current record, the next export record will take
139  // care of it
140  bs_reader->bd_entry = NULL;
141  // check if the end of the file was already reached before
142  // reading a new value
143  //if(bs_reader->bd_mgr->eof != 0) {
144  // bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: read new data: end of file reached");
145  // bs_reader->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_END_OF_DUMP;
146  // return;
147  //}
148  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: read new data (previous): %ld\t%ld\t%s\t%s\t%d",
149  bs_reader->record_time,
150  bs_reader->dump_time,
151  bs_reader->dump_type,
152  bs_reader->dump_collector,
153  bs_reader->status);
154  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: read new data: reading new entry (or entries) in bgpdump");
155  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: read new data: from %s", bs_reader->dump_name);
156  while(!significant_entry) {
157  bgpstream_debug("\t\t\tBSR: read new data: reading");
158  bs_reader->bd_entry = get_next_entry(bs_reader);
159  // check if there was an error opening the dump
160  if(bs_reader->status == BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_CANT_OPEN_DUMP) {
161  return;
162  }
163  // check if an entry has been read
164  if(bs_reader->bd_entry != NULL) {
165  bs_reader->successful_read++;
166  // check if entry is compatible with filters
167  if(bgpstream_reader_filter_bd_entry(bs_reader->bd_entry, filter_mgr)) {
168  // update reader fields
169  bs_reader->valid_read++;
170  bs_reader->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_VALID_ENTRY;
171  bs_reader->record_time = (long) bs_reader->bd_entry->time;
172  significant_entry = true;
173  }
174  // if not compatible, destroy bgpdump entry
175  else {
176  bgpdump_free_mem(bs_reader->bd_entry);
177  bs_reader->bd_entry = NULL;
178  // significant_entry = false;
179  }
180  }
181  // if an entry has not been read (i.e. b_e = NULL)
182  else {
183  // if the corrupted entry flag is
184  // active, then dump is corrupted
185  if(bs_reader->bd_mgr->corrupted_read) {
186  bs_reader->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_CORRUPTED_DUMP;
187  significant_entry = true;
188  }
189  // empty read, not corrupted
190  else {
191  // end of file
192  if(bs_reader->bd_mgr->eof != 0) {
193  significant_entry = true;
194  if(bs_reader->successful_read == 0) {
195  // file was empty
196  bs_reader->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_EMPTY_DUMP;
197  }
198  else {
199  if(bs_reader->valid_read == 0) {
200  // valid contained entries, but
201  // none of them was compatible with
202  // filters
203  bs_reader->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_FILTERED_DUMP;
204  }
205  else {
206  // something valid has been read before
207  // reached the end of file
208  bs_reader->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_END_OF_DUMP;
209  }
210  }
211  }
212  // empty space at the *beginning* of file
213  else {
214  // do nothing - continue to read
215  // significant_entry = false;
216  }
217  }
218  }
219  }
220  // a significant entry has been found
221  // and the reader has been updated accordingly
222  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: read new data: end");
223  return;
224 }
225 
226 static void bgpstream_reader_destroy(bgpstream_reader_t * const bs_reader) {
227 
228  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: destroy reader start");
229  if(bs_reader == NULL) {
230  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: destroy reader: null reader provided");
231  return;
232  }
233 
234  /* Ensure the thread is done */
235  pthread_join(bs_reader->producer, NULL);
236  pthread_mutex_destroy(&bs_reader->mutex);
237  pthread_cond_destroy(&bs_reader->dump_ready_cond);
238 
239  // we do not deallocate memory for bd_entry
240  // (the last entry may be still in use in
241  // the current record)
242  bs_reader->bd_entry = NULL;
243  // close bgpdump
244  bgpdump_close_dump(bs_reader->bd_mgr);
245  bs_reader->bd_mgr = NULL;
246  // deallocate all memory for reader
247  free(bs_reader);
248  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: destroy reader end");
249 }
250 
251 static bgpstream_reader_t * bgpstream_reader_create(const bgpstream_input_t * const bs_input,
252  const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t * const filter_mgr) {
253  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: create reader start");
254  if(bs_input == NULL) {
255  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: create reader: empty bs_input provided");
256  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: create reader end");
257  return NULL; // no input to read
258  }
259  // allocate memory for reader
260  bgpstream_reader_t *bs_reader = (bgpstream_reader_t*) malloc(sizeof(bgpstream_reader_t));
261  if(bs_reader == NULL) {
262  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: create reader: can't allocate memory for reader");
263  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: create reader end");
264  return NULL; // can't allocate memory for reader
265  }
266  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: create reader: initialize fields");
267  // fields initialization
268  bs_reader->next = NULL;
269  bs_reader->bd_mgr = NULL;
270  bs_reader->bd_entry = NULL;
271  //memset(bs_reader->dump_name, 0, BGPSTREAM_DUMP_MAX_LEN);
272  //memset(bs_reader->dump_project, 0, BGPSTREAM_PAR_MAX_LEN);
273  //memset(bs_reader->dump_collector, 0, BGPSTREAM_PAR_MAX_LEN);
274  //memset(bs_reader->dump_type, 0, BGPSTREAM_PAR_MAX_LEN);
275  // init done
276  strcpy(bs_reader->dump_name, bs_input->filename);
277  strcpy(bs_reader->dump_project, bs_input->fileproject);
278  strcpy(bs_reader->dump_collector, bs_input->filecollector);
279  strcpy(bs_reader->dump_type, bs_input->filetype);
280  bs_reader->dump_time = bs_input->epoch_filetime;
281  bs_reader->record_time = bs_input->epoch_filetime;
282  bs_reader->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_VALID_ENTRY; // let's be optimistic :)
283  bs_reader->valid_read = 0;
284  bs_reader->successful_read = 0;
285 
286  pthread_mutex_init(&bs_reader->mutex, NULL);
287  pthread_cond_init(&bs_reader->dump_ready_cond,NULL);
288  bs_reader->dump_ready = 0;
289  bs_reader->skip_dump_check = 0;
290 
291  // bgpdump is created in the thread
292  pthread_create(&bs_reader->producer, NULL, thread_producer, bs_reader);
293 
294  /* // call bgpstream_reader_read_new_data */
295  /* bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: create reader: read new data"); */
296  /* bgpstream_reader_read_new_data(bs_reader, filter_mgr); */
297  /* bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: create reader: end"); */
298  // return reader
299  return bs_reader;
300 }
301 
302 
303 
304 static void bgpstream_reader_export_record(bgpstream_reader_t * const bs_reader,
305  bgpstream_record_t * const bs_record,
306  const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *const filter_mgr) {
307  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: export record: start");
308  if(bs_reader == NULL) {
309  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: export record: invalid reader provided");
310  return;
311  }
312  if(bs_record == NULL) {
313  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: export record: invalid record provided");
314  return;
315  }
316  // if bs_reader status is BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_END_OF_DUMP we shouldn't have called this
317  // function
318  if(bs_reader->status == BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_END_OF_DUMP) {
319  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: export record: end of dump was reached");
320  return;
321  }
322  // read bgpstream_reader field and copy them to a bs_record
323  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: export record: copying bd_entry");
324  bs_record->bd_entry = bs_reader->bd_entry;
325  // disconnect reader from exported entry
326  bs_reader->bd_entry = NULL;
327  // memset(bs_record->attributes.dump_project, 0, BGPSTREAM_PAR_MAX_LEN);
328  // memset(bs_record->attributes.dump_collector, 0, BGPSTREAM_PAR_MAX_LEN);
329  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: export record: copying attributes");
330  strcpy(bs_record->attributes.dump_project, bs_reader->dump_project);
331  strcpy(bs_record->attributes.dump_collector, bs_reader->dump_collector);
332  // strcpy(bs_record->attributes.dump_type, bs_reader->dump_type);
333  if(strcmp(bs_reader->dump_type, "ribs") == 0) {
334  bs_record->attributes.dump_type = BGPSTREAM_RIB;
335  }
336  else {
337  bs_record->attributes.dump_type = BGPSTREAM_UPDATE;
338  }
339  bs_record->attributes.dump_time = bs_reader->dump_time;
340  bs_record->attributes.record_time = bs_reader->record_time;
341  // if this is the first significant record and no previous
342  // valid record has been discarded because of time
343  if(bs_reader->valid_read == 1 && bs_reader->successful_read == 1) {
344  bs_record->dump_pos = BGPSTREAM_DUMP_START;
345  }
346  else {
347  bs_record->dump_pos = BGPSTREAM_DUMP_MIDDLE;
348  }
349  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: export record: copying status");
350  switch(bs_reader->status){
351  case BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_VALID_ENTRY:
352  bs_record->status = BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_VALID_RECORD;
353  break;
354  case BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_FILTERED_DUMP:
355  bs_record->status = BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_FILTERED_SOURCE;
356  break;
357  case BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_EMPTY_DUMP:
358  bs_record->status = BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_EMPTY_SOURCE;
359  break;
360  case BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_CANT_OPEN_DUMP:
361  bs_record->status = BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_CORRUPTED_SOURCE;
362  break;
363  case BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_CORRUPTED_DUMP:
364  bs_record->status = BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_CORRUPTED_RECORD;
365  break;
366  default:
367  bs_record->status = BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_EMPTY_SOURCE;
368  }
369  bgpstream_debug("Exported: %ld\t%ld\t%d\t%s\t%d",
370  bs_record->attributes.record_time,
371  bs_record->attributes.dump_time,
372  bs_record->attributes.dump_type,
373  bs_record->attributes.dump_collector,
374  bs_record->status);
375 
377  char buffer[BUFFER_LEN];
378  khiter_t k;
379  int khret;
380  if(filter_mgr->rib_period != 0 &&
381  (bs_record->status == BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_CORRUPTED_SOURCE ||
382  bs_record->status == BGPSTREAM_RECORD_STATUS_CORRUPTED_RECORD))
383  {
384  snprintf(buffer, BUFFER_LEN, "%s.%s",
385  bs_record->attributes.dump_project, bs_record->attributes.dump_collector);
386  if((k = kh_get(collector_ts, filter_mgr->last_processed_ts,
387  buffer)) == kh_end(filter_mgr->last_processed_ts))
388  {
389  k = kh_put(collector_ts, filter_mgr->last_processed_ts,
390  strdup(buffer), &khret);
391  }
392  kh_value(filter_mgr->last_processed_ts, k) = 0;
393  }
394 
395  bgpstream_debug("\t\tBSR: export record: end");
396 }
397 
398 
399  //function used for debug
400 static void print_reader_queue(const bgpstream_reader_t * const reader_queue) {
401 #ifdef NDEBUG
402  const bgpstream_reader_t * iterator = reader_queue;
403  bgpstream_debug("READER QUEUE: start");
404  int i = 1;
405  while(iterator != NULL) {
406  bgpstream_debug("\t%d %s %s %ld %ld %d",i, iterator->dump_collector, iterator->dump_type, iterator->dump_time, iterator->record_time, iterator->status);
407  iterator = iterator->next;
408  i++;
409  }
410  iterator = NULL;
411  bgpstream_debug("\nREADER QUEUE: end");
412 #endif
413 }

420 
421 bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * bgpstream_reader_mgr_create(const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t * const filter_mgr) {
422  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: create reader mgr: start");
423  // allocate memory and initialize fields
424  bgpstream_reader_mgr_t *bs_reader_mgr = (bgpstream_reader_mgr_t*) malloc(sizeof(bgpstream_reader_mgr_t));
425  if(bs_reader_mgr == NULL) {
426  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: create reader mgr: can't allocate memory for reader mgr");
427  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: create reader mgr end");
428  return NULL; // can't allocate memory for reader
429  }
430  // mgr initialization
431  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: create reader mgr: initialization");
432  bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue = NULL;
433  bs_reader_mgr->filter_mgr = filter_mgr;
434  bs_reader_mgr->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_MGR_STATUS_EMPTY_READER_MGR;
435  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: create reader mgr: end");
436  return bs_reader_mgr;
437 }
438 
439 
440 bool bgpstream_reader_mgr_is_empty(const bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * const bs_reader_mgr) {
441  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: is_empty start");
442  if(bs_reader_mgr == NULL) {
443  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: is_empty end: empty!");
444  return true;
445  }
446  if(bs_reader_mgr->status == BGPSTREAM_READER_MGR_STATUS_EMPTY_READER_MGR) {
447  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: is_empty end: empty!");
448  return true;
449  }
450  else {
451  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: is_empty end: non-empty!");
452  return false;
453  }
454 }
455 
456 
457 static void bgpstream_reader_mgr_sorted_insert(bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * const bs_reader_mgr,
458  bgpstream_reader_t * const bs_reader) {
459  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: sorted insert:start");
460  if(bs_reader_mgr == NULL) {
461  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: sorted insert: null reader mgr provided");
462  return;
463  }
464  if(bs_reader == NULL) {
465  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: sorted insert: null reader provided");
466  return;
467  }
468 
469  bgpstream_reader_t * iterator = bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue;
470  bgpstream_reader_t * previous_iterator = bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue;
471  bool inserted = false;
472  // insert new reader in priority queue
473  while(!inserted) {
474  // case 1: insertion in empty queue (reader_queue == NULL)
475  if(bs_reader_mgr->status == BGPSTREAM_READER_MGR_STATUS_EMPTY_READER_MGR) {
476  bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue = bs_reader;
477  bs_reader->next = NULL;
478  bs_reader_mgr->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_MGR_STATUS_NON_EMPTY_READER_MGR;
479  inserted = true;
480  continue;
481  }
482  // case 2: insertion in non-empty queue
483  else {
484  // reached the end of the queue
485  if(iterator == NULL) {
486  previous_iterator->next = bs_reader;
487  bs_reader->next = NULL;
488  inserted = true;
489  continue;
490  }
491  // still in the middle of the queue
492  else {
493  // if time is the same
494  if(bs_reader->record_time == iterator->record_time) {
495  // if type is the same -> continue
496  if(strcmp(iterator->dump_type, bs_reader->dump_type) == 0){
497  previous_iterator = iterator;
498  iterator = previous_iterator->next;
499  continue;
500  }
501  // if the queue contains ribs, and the current reader
502  // is an update -> continue
503  if(strcmp(iterator->dump_type, "ribs") == 0 &&
504  strcmp(bs_reader->dump_type, "updates") == 0){
505  previous_iterator = iterator;
506  iterator = previous_iterator->next;
507  continue;
508  }
509  // if the queue contains updates, and the current reader
510  // is a rib -> insert
511  if(strcmp(iterator->dump_type, "updates") == 0 &&
512  strcmp(bs_reader->dump_type, "ribs") == 0){
513  // insertion at the beginning of the queue
514  if(previous_iterator == bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue &&
515  iterator == bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue) {
516  bs_reader->next = bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue;
517  bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue = bs_reader;
518  }
519  // insertion in the middle of the queue
520  else {
521  previous_iterator->next = bs_reader;
522  bs_reader->next = iterator;
523  }
524  inserted = true;
525  continue;
526  }
527  }
528  // if time is different
529  else {
530  // if reader time is lower than iterator time
531  // then insert
532  if(bs_reader->record_time < iterator->record_time) {
533  // insertion at the beginning of the queue
534  if(previous_iterator == bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue &&
535  iterator == bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue) {
536  bs_reader->next = bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue;
537  bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue = bs_reader;
538  }
539  // insertion in the middle of the queue
540  else {
541  previous_iterator->next = bs_reader;
542  bs_reader->next = iterator;
543  }
544  inserted = true;
545  continue;
546  }
547  }
548  // otherwise update the iterators
549  previous_iterator = iterator;
550  iterator = previous_iterator->next;
551  }
552  }
553  }
554  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: sorted insert: end");
555 }
556 
557 
558 static int
559 bgpstream_reader_period_check(const bgpstream_input_t *in,
560  const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *const filter_mgr)
561 {
562  /* consider making this buffer static at the beginning of the file */
563  char buffer[BUFFER_LEN];
564  khiter_t k;
565  int khret;
566 
567  if((filter_mgr->rib_period != 0 &&
568  strcmp(in->filetype, "ribs") == 0))
569  {
570  snprintf(buffer, BUFFER_LEN, "%s.%s",
571  in->fileproject, in->filecollector);
572  /* first instance */
573  if((k = kh_get(collector_ts, filter_mgr->last_processed_ts,
574  buffer)) == kh_end(filter_mgr->last_processed_ts))
575  {
576  k = kh_put(collector_ts, filter_mgr->last_processed_ts,
577  strdup(buffer), &khret);
578  kh_value(filter_mgr->last_processed_ts, k) = in->epoch_filetime;
579  return 1;
580  }
581 
582  /* we have to check the frequency only if we get a new filetime */
583  if(in->epoch_filetime != kh_value(filter_mgr->last_processed_ts, k))
584  {
585  if(in->epoch_filetime <
586  kh_value(filter_mgr->last_processed_ts, k) + filter_mgr->rib_period)
587  {
588  return 0;
589  }
590  kh_value(filter_mgr->last_processed_ts, k) = in->epoch_filetime;
591  }
592  }
593 
594  return 1;
595 }
596 
597 
598 void bgpstream_reader_mgr_add(bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * const bs_reader_mgr,
599  const bgpstream_input_t * const toprocess_queue,
600  const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t * const filter_mgr) {
601  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: add input: start");
602  const bgpstream_input_t * iterator = toprocess_queue;
603  bgpstream_reader_t * bs_reader = NULL;
604 
605  /* tmp structure to hold reader pointers */
606  bgpstream_reader_t **tmp_reader_queue = NULL;
607  int i = 0;
608  int max_readers = 0;
609  int max = 0;
610  while(iterator != NULL) {
611  max_readers++;
612  iterator = iterator->next;
613  }
614  tmp_reader_queue = (bgpstream_reader_t **) malloc(sizeof(bgpstream_reader_t *) * max_readers);
615 
616  /* foreach bgpstream input add it to the queue and create a reader */
617  iterator = toprocess_queue;
618  while(iterator != NULL) {
619  if(bgpstream_reader_period_check(iterator, filter_mgr))
620  {
621  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: add input: i");
622  // a) create a new reader (create includes the first read)
623  bs_reader = bgpstream_reader_create(iterator, filter_mgr);
624  // if it creates correctly then add it to the temporary queue
625  if(bs_reader != NULL) {
626  tmp_reader_queue[i] = bs_reader;
627  i++;
628  }
629  else{
630  bgpstream_log_err("ERROR: could not create reader\n");
631  return;
632  }
633  }
634  // go to the next input
635  iterator = iterator->next;
636  }
637  /* then for each reader read the first record and add it to the reader queue */
638  max = i;
639  for(i =0; i < max; i++)
640  {
641  bs_reader = tmp_reader_queue[i];
642  bgpstream_reader_read_new_data(bs_reader, filter_mgr);
643  bgpstream_reader_mgr_sorted_insert(bs_reader_mgr, bs_reader);
644  }
645  free(tmp_reader_queue);
646  tmp_reader_queue = NULL;
647  print_reader_queue(bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue);
648  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: add input: end");
649 }
650 
651 
652 
653 int bgpstream_reader_mgr_get_next_record(bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * const bs_reader_mgr,
654  bgpstream_record_t *const bs_record,
655  const bgpstream_filter_mgr_t * const filter_mgr) {
656  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: get_next_record: start");
657  if(bs_reader_mgr == NULL) {
658  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: get_next_record: null reader mgr provided");
659  return -1;
660  }
661  if(bs_record == NULL) {
662  bgpstream_debug("BSR_MGR: get_next_record: null record provided");
663  return -1;
664  }
665  if(bs_reader_mgr->status == BGPSTREAM_READER_MGR_STATUS_EMPTY_READER_MGR) {
666  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: get_next_record: empty reader mgr");
667  return 0;
668  }
669  // get head from reader queue
670  bgpstream_reader_t *bs_reader = bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue;
671  bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue = bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue->next;
672  if(bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue == NULL) { // check if last reader
673  bs_reader_mgr->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_MGR_STATUS_EMPTY_READER_MGR;
674  }
675  // disconnect reader from the queue
676  bs_reader->next = NULL;
677  // bgpstream_reader_export
678  bgpstream_reader_export_record(bs_reader, bs_record, filter_mgr);
679  // we save the difference between successful read
680  // and valid read, so we can check if some valid data
681  // have been discarded during the last read_new_data
682  int read_diff = bs_reader->successful_read - bs_reader->valid_read;
683  // if previous read was successful, we read next
684  // entry from same reader
685  if(bs_reader->status == BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_VALID_ENTRY) {
686  bgpstream_reader_read_new_data(bs_reader, filter_mgr);
687  // if end of dump is reached after a successful read (already exported)
688  // we destroy the reader
689  if(bs_reader->status == BGPSTREAM_READER_STATUS_END_OF_DUMP) {
690  if((bs_reader->successful_read - bs_reader->valid_read) == read_diff) {
691  bs_record->dump_pos = BGPSTREAM_DUMP_END;
692  }
693  // otherwise we maintain the dump_pos already assigned
694  bgpstream_reader_destroy(bs_reader);
695  }
696  // otherwise we insert the reader in the queue again
697  else {
698  bgpstream_reader_mgr_sorted_insert(bs_reader_mgr, bs_reader);
699  }
700  }
701  // otherwise we destroy the reader
702  else {
703  bs_record->dump_pos = BGPSTREAM_DUMP_END;
704  bgpstream_reader_destroy(bs_reader);
705  }
706  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: get_next_record: end");
707  return 1;
708 }
709 
710 
711 void bgpstream_reader_mgr_destroy(bgpstream_reader_mgr_t * const bs_reader_mgr) {
712  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: destroy reader mgr: start");
713  if(bs_reader_mgr == NULL) {
714  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: destroy reader mgr: null reader mgr provided");
715  return;
716  }
717  bs_reader_mgr->filter_mgr = NULL;
718  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: destroy reader mgr: destroying reader queue");
719  // foreach reader in queue: destroy reader
720  bgpstream_reader_t *iterator;
721  while(bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue !=NULL){
722  // at every step we destroy the reader referenced
723  // by the reader_queue
724  iterator = bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue;
725  bs_reader_mgr->reader_queue = iterator->next;
726  bgpstream_reader_destroy(iterator);
727  }
728  bs_reader_mgr->status = BGPSTREAM_READER_MGR_STATUS_EMPTY_READER_MGR;
729  free(bs_reader_mgr);
730  bgpstream_debug("\tBSR_MGR: destroy reader mgr: end");
731 }
